thread.title: Racing Drone Captures Stunning Footage Flying up a Snow-Covered Mountain
thread.title_full: Racing Drone Captures Stunning Footage Flying up a Snow-Covered Mountain

author: Marcus Cho
title: Racing Drone Captures Stunning Footage Flying up a Snow-Covered Mountain
text:
Subscribe to Highsnobiety on YouTube 
Drones have been on the rise lately with their many uses – from Pokémon Go to getting footage of massive concert halls , it almost seems like there’s no limit to what you can do with them. 
Gab707 ‘s newest drone video is another great testament to this sentiment – the video is almost movie-like in its shot composition. Featuring steady, flowing shots of an enormous, snow covered mountain, the video is tied together by an intense instrumental for an effect you’d have to experience to fully grasp. 
Check out the video in the gallery above, and for more tech news, check out the latest on Samsung’s Galaxy Note 8 .
